body.para: Author: jflesch Date: 2007-08-13 19:19:30 +0000 (Mon, 13 Aug 2007) New Revision: 14662

Added: tags/Thaw/0.7.10/ Log: Thaw 0.7.10 (pre-0.8) : - Fix a major bug in the index refreshes : When a download failed, the tree
was'nt notified - Fix a major bug in the frost message parsing : When the signature is being
checked, the attached board names must not be case-sensitives. - Fix a minor bug in the frost message generation : Use GMT time instead of
local time - Fix a minor bug in the plugin TransferLogs : The button "purge logs" didn't
work - Fix the scroll bar speed in the message view when using the mouse wheel - Change the index icon to a red icon when Thaw can't download a specific index - Allow multiple message selections in the message list of MiniFrost. - Don't display anymore the obsolete indexes (pre-1010) in the unknown index
list
